title: Kashmiris to observe Accession to Pakistan on July 19: Imtiaz Wani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):All Parties Hurriyat Conference, Senior Hurriyat leader Imtiaz Wani has said that 19th July is an important day in the history of Kashmir when the Kashmiri people had attached their future with Pakistan in 1947.
It was on this day in 1947 when genuine representatives of majority of Kashmiris unanimously passed the resolution of Kashmir’s Accession to Pakistan during a meeting of the All Jammu and Kashmir Muslim Conference at the residence of Sardar Muhammad Ibrahim Khan in Aabi Guzar area of Srinagar, said a press release.
The historic resolution called for the Accession of the State of Jammu and Kashmir to Pakistan in view of its existing religious, geographical, cultural and economic proximity to Pakistan and aspirations of millions of Kashmiri Muslims.
He said  expressing serious concern over the continued cordon and search operations, killings and arresting youth has urged world human rights bodies to take notice of the worst situation of Kashmir. He said that these atrocities are being committed to suppress Kashmiri voices but the oppressors while committing these inhuman acts are forgetting the historical fact that freedom movements of nations never get suppressed by these kinds of tyrannies. He said that Kashmiris will never tolerate this killing spree, atrocities and will keep protesting against these undemocratic and inhuman acts.He has paid glowing tributes to the martyred by the Indian troops in many different places and reiterated to continue the freedom struggle till its logical conclusion.
He also condemned the continued unlawful detention of Hurriyat leaders and activists. He appealed to international human rights Council and International committee to take cognizance of the plight of the Kashmir detainees and impress upon New Delhi to release them forthwith.
